scripts.watch: TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true yarn workspace @pccontrol/build run webpack watch --config ../build/presets/webpack.config.ts
scripts.dev: TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true yarn workspace @pccontrol/build run webpack serve --config ../build/presets/webpack.config.ts
scripts.prod: TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true yarn workspace @pccontrol/build run webpack --config ../build/presets/webpack.config.ts --mode production
